title: System can be shut down without savefile warnings
description: When a WSWB session is open with some opened, dirty .txt file, shutting down Windows will cause the loss of the changes in the .txt file.
OB: If a WSWB session is open with a dirty .txt file and the user shuts down Windows using the Start menu command, the computer is shut down/rebooted immediately without any warning or question message box to prompt the user to save their dirty model(s).
SR:
1. Open WSWB.
2. Create a new project.
3. Create a text file in the project and add a line of text to it.
4. Observe that the text file is marked as a dirty file.
5. Left click on the Windows Start menu.
6. Select the 'Shut Down' command to shut down/reboot the computer.

Expected Results:
A warning or question message box should be displayed, giving users a chance to save their dirty model(s) before shutting down the computer.
